Welcome to the MetLife Digital ToolkitPage Title

Delivering our global presence to the MetLife family

Search toolkit resources & assets:

The MetLife Toolkit is your digital design sherpa, guiding you through the peaks and valleys of the MetLife Digital terrain.

A digital tool to help you present the MetLife brand in the most consistent and effective way possible. The Toolkit provides detailed guidance for implementing the strategic and visual components that represent our global organization: vision, personality, branding, color palette, typography and more.

To learn how to use this toolkit & see what we've done, Start Here >
